name: Earthquake, Run!
description:
In Earthquake, Run! you are a humble rectangle running from a world that is unzipping itself.

Controls:

Space : Jump / Double Jump
Ctrl : Ground Slam
Shift : Duck
Z : Dash

Source is included as a separate download if you want to read my mess. Also available on https://github.com/MyQly/lovejam-2022

Great jumping sound effect from sndfxr.
Wonderful font from @KenneyNL
